message.raw:
update inertia of fixed attached frames at the end of kinematic chain in multisense_sl head model (to be lumped to parent link) such that

  * overall mass is conserved (move CG to parent link location, subtract mass from parent link)
  * MOI added is 1e-6 kg*m^2 for each frame so it's insignificant.

ref:  http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/2150/drcsim-fat-head-random-head-parts-have-too-large/
ref:  issue #157
